meta.name: description
meta.content: It is our mission to educate and empower all learners to design their best future.

li.a: Blueprint QV: New High School Project

section.class: content-container news2-container slick-container content-size-large orientation-horizontal thumbnail-coverage-full

div.div: The Quaker Valley Administration shared an amended 2020 end-of-year calendar with the School Board at Monday night's legislative meeting.
Remote Learning will continue through Friday, May 29.
The Quaker Valley Athletic Office would like to recognize the senior student-athletes who would have been competing during the spring season.

h3.a: Retired QV Teacher and Boys Soccer Coach Named to WPIAL Hall of Fame

div.div: Congratulations to Gene Klein, a member of the Hall of Fame Class of 2020.
Quaker Valley School District is CLOSED for the remainder of the academic year as a result of the COVID-19 (Coronavirus) pandemic.

div.a: Learn more about the high school project

h3.em: Educating and empowering all learners to design their best future.

div.span: 100 Leetsdale Industrial Drive - Suite B, Leetsdale, PA 15056 | 412-749-3600
